sys_update_version.payload: truedefault.container { background-color: #ffffff; max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 20px !important; text-align: center; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); margin-bottom: 20px; margin-top: 20px; } .content { color: #333333; font-size: 28px; margin-bottom: 20px; } .content > div { color: #666666; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 20px; } .content > div:last-child { margin-bottom: 0; /* Remove margin from the last div */ } .content a { background-color: #f19235; color: #ffffff; text-decoration: none; padding: 10px 20px; border-radius: 5px; font-size: 18px; } 1x_1342897_unite_un.usermda1a3b51b83c5ce1076389630ceaad3e98679ef89cb21120000f8d856634c9c4fsp_instanceadmin2024-03-25 08:16:00a5a3b51b83c5ce1076389630ceaad3ee164c5b50d8309061076389630ceaad3f164c5b50d8309061076389630ceaad3f1sp_instance_a5a3b51b83c5ce1076389630ceaad3eeadmin2024-03-25 08:19:02<url/><widget_parameters><![CDATA[{ "html": { "value": "<div class=\"container\">\r\n<div class=\"content\">\r\n<h1>Achieve Your Dreams with us</h1>\r\n<div>At Unite University, you can apply for a diverse range of international degree programmes, exchange and doctoral studies, and more.</div>\r\n<div><a href=\"https://dev243288.service-now.com/uu?id=sc_cat_item&sys_id=ad2ac2458389061076389630ceaad337\">Apply Now</a></div>\r\n</div>\r\n</div>", "displayValue": "<div class=\"container\">\n<div class=\"content\">\n<h1>Achieve Your Dreams with us</h1>\n<div>At Unite University, you can apply for a diverse range of international degree programmes, exchange and doctoral studies, and more.</div>\n<div><a href=\"https://dev243288.service-now.com/uu?id=sc_cat_item&sys_id=ad2ac2458389061076389630ceaad337\">Apply Now</a></div>\n</div>\n</div>" } }]]></widget_parameters></sp_instance><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a5a3b51b83c5ce1076389630ceaad3ee"/></record_update>
